item.sql: ALTER TABLE note ADD objectversion UUID
UPDATE note n SET objectversion = (SELECT version FROM dataobject WHERE dbkey = objectdbkey);

item.log: Make the objectversion mandatory for the note table.
item.sql: ALTER TABLE note MODIFY objectversion UUID NOT NULL

item.log: Create foreign key constraint for note.dbkey/objectversion - dataobject.dbkey/version.
item.sql: ALTER TABLE note ADD CONSTRAINT note_objectdbkeyversion_dataobject_dbkeyversion_fk FOREIGN KEY(objectdbkey, objectversion) REFERENCES dataobject(dbkey, version)
